thread.title: Emmerdale viewers devastated as Aaron Dingle gets 12 MONTHS behind bars
thread.title_full: Emmerdale viewers devastated as Aaron Dingle gets 12 MONTHS behind bars

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Emmerdale viewers devastated as Aaron Dingle gets 12 MONTHS behind bars
text:
Emmerdale viewers devastated as Aaron Dingle gets 12 MONTHS behind bars Fans were upset after his sentence was revealed on Thursday night Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Aaron meets his cellmate - but will he be safe? Share this video Get soaps   
Emmerdale viewers have been left devastated after Aaron Dingle learned his prison sentence for attacking Kasim Sabet. 
In scenes aired on Thursday evening, he found out he would have to spend 12 months behind bars - and fans couldn't believe it. 
Many took to social media after the big moment, and were quick to make their feelings known after the sentence was handed out. Aaron in court for sentencing (Photo: ITV) 
"If anyone needs me I'll be in a dark room crying until Aaron is out. See ya in 12 months #Emmerdale," tweeted one distraught viewer. Read More 
Another said: "I'm actually crying... even though I knew it was coming it's still heartbreaking... be strong Aaron #Emmerdale" The show will follow his time in prison over the coming weeks (Photo: ITV) 
A different fan added: "My heart is legit breaking for Aaron right now #Emmerdale #robron" 
There was further heartbreak for viewers as the prison warden asked Aaron if he has any kind of disability. Read More 
He heartbreakingly replied: "Yes. I can't stop crying all the time." Aaron is heading behind bars (Photo: ITV) 
Not everyone was quite so sympathetic though, with some people suggesting it was just what the character deserved. 
One viewer said: "#emmerdale no sympathy for Aaron, if you don't wanna go to prison then you shouldn't have beaten the s**t out of someone" Like us on Facebook
